document_data.mainbody:
ukini was the daughter of the Reghedmen barbarian prince Kinnuki and his Liskanite lover Mathilda who died circa 1269 DR after surviving the Great Thaw in Icewind Dale.
Jukinis father, Kinnuki fell in love with the wife of an evil necromancer from Luskan who came to Icewind Dale to search for eternal life away from the prying eyes of other mages of the Arcane Brotherhood. Kinnuki and Mathilda ran away from the evil wizard and eventually had Jukini while living with the barbarian princes tribe. The necromancer, Damien Morienus summoned demons to hunt them down, and eventually, the lower planes creatures caused the even called the Great Thaw circa 1269 DR. Almost all of the tribe, along with Mathilda, perished when the ice cracked under their feet. Jukini survived the arctic waters but died a few days later of bad fever.
